message.body: Morning! Hope the trip is going well. What time are you guys heading back, should I feed everyone dinner?
Hey, i meant to ask about the plumbing at your house. All finished up?
Not quite but is seems like by the end of the weekend!
Which is faster than I thought!
Well you are totally welcome to stay until it's done. Seriously.
Oh man thank you! If it goes past the weekend I might call you ha. I'm prepared to handle a few days I think.
Please do. You are completely welcome at any point.
I left a UPS package inside your door as I was heading out!
We are home. Thanks so much for everythng! Happy animals and everything looks great.
Yay! Glad you guys made it and enjoy your fur babies!
